classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Ceremonial Objects
creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in the form of a lotus flower; the handle of coiled dragons is carved in high relief, and there is a small lotus carved on the inside of the cup; carved wood base
title: Libation Cup with Base
